metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6362 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Double free vulnerability in the gdImagePngPtr function in libgd2 before 2.2.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via vectors related to a palette with no colors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.8
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.8
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.8').
